nodes.text: The Nuala Marauders were a group of pirates who were active in the galaxy during the Clone Wars. The Nuala Marauders, alongside many other groups, were supported by the Confederacy of Independent Systems and encouraged by Count Dooku to harass Galactic Republic supply lines.

The Nuala Marauders were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The group was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the comic set Aurra's Song written by Dean Motter and published by Dark Horse Comics in 2000.
